message: I think this is a fair split. We both get something, but I get the majority since I'm the one taking the risk of making the first offer.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I propose a more balanced split, recognizing that we both lose if this goes on too long.
This round, the money is worth less to me. Let's split it evenly, Bob. We both get a fair amount, and we can end this game now.
